summary: This memorandum discusses the revised Related Mission Directive for Mexico. It outlines the long-range national policy objectives of the U.S. Government toward Mexico, operational emphasis on clandestine collection and covert action operations, and changes in the MAD. The directive includes objectives related to obtaining information on Sino-Soviet bloc activities, reducing Communist influence, obtaining information on the Communist Party of Mexico, and supporting efforts against the Castro regime in Cuba.
title: Related Mission Directive for Mexico
